name: Signature Synergy
summary: Your eidolon gains an evolution integral to its form, and it comes more easily than your other synergies.
description:
Your eidolon gains an evolution integral to its form, and it comes more easily than your other synergies. You gain one evolution feat from the following list: Airborne Form, Burrowing Form, Ever-Vigilant Senses, or Hulking Size. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your summoner level is equal to your character level â€“ 4.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
